item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Serverless workspaces in Azure Databricks
item.description:
Azure Databricks now offers Serverless workspaces in Public Preview â€” a fully managed workspace option that includes preconfigured serverless compute and default storage to provide an enterprise-ready SaaS experience with minimal infrastructure management.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Workspaces and workspace gateways in the Premium v2 tier of Azure API Management
item.description:
Azure announced general availability of workspaces and workspace gateways for the Premium v2 tier of Azure API Management, while the Premium v2 tier itself remains in preview. Workspaces enable organizations to manage and govern APIs.

  • Source: Azure Updates
